channel.title: AI Identity on The Approximate Mind
channel.description: Recent content in AI Identity on The Approximate Mind

item.title: The Approximate Mind, Part 23: When AI Remembers Itself
item.description: Everything I wrote in Part 22 assumed current AI architecture: stateless inference, no persistent self, each instance fresh. The system has no continuity. It doesn’t remember being reliable yesterday. It accumulates no history that could constitute character.
